line_1: Tell me what Genius did this art contrive.
line_2: Which dead men speak as well as those alive —

line_1: And if Hippolytus can but contrive
line_2: To buy the gilded Chariot; John can drive.

line_1: But would plain Songs in artless Verse contrive,
line_2: And humbly modest only asks to Dive.

line_1: Did Death and Tombs for Foes contrive:
line_2: That most of Us are still alive.
Ah me, I find in vain I strive,

line_1: To cheat our eyes how well dost thou contrive!
line_2: Each object here seems real and alive.

line_1: Sure at this homely hutt one may contrive
line_2: Awhile not only to exist, but live;
